sentences.en: a heavy suitcase
sentences.cn: 沉重的手提箱

sentences.en: A variety of heavy industries grew up alongside the port.
sentences.cn: 各种重工业沿着港口逐渐发展起来。

sentences.en: Cut the lobster shells into small pieces with heavy-duty scissors.
sentences.cn: 用粗剪将龙虾壳剪成小片。

sentences.en: He didn't just command. He personally fought in several heavy battles.
sentences.cn: 他不仅仅发号施令，还身先士卒参加了几次激战。

sentences.en: Heavy Metal music really arose in the late 60s.
sentences.cn: 重金属音乐真正形成于60年代后期。

sentences.en: Heavy rain has caused flooding in many areas.
sentences.cn: 大雨在很多地区造成水灾。

sentences.en: His heavy boots cumbered him in walking.
sentences.cn: 他的笨重的靴子使他行走不便。

sentences.en: How heavy is the parcel (= how much does it weigh? ) ?
sentences.cn: 这个包裹有多重？

sentences.en: I didn't realize how heavy that shopping was going to be.
sentences.cn: 我没想到买的东西会有多沉。

sentences.en: I don't want any more of that heavy stuff.
sentences.cn: 我再也不想碰那种麻烦事了。

sentences.en: I slowly zipped and locked the heavy black nylon bags.
sentences.cn: 我慢慢地把那些沉重的黑色尼龙袋的拉链拉上并锁好。

sentences.en: It all depends on how heavy-handed you are with the paprika.
sentences.cn: 这要看你下多重的辣椒粉了。

sentences.en: Now and then they heard the roar of a heavy truck.
sentences.cn: 他们不时地听到大卡车的轰鸣声。

sentences.en: she found Hilary heavy going.
sentences.cn: 她发觉希拉里这个人不容易对付。

sentences.en: The apple trees were heavy with fruit.
sentences.cn: 苹果树上果实累累。

sentences.en: The city has been flattened by heavy artillery bombardments.
sentences.cn: 城市已被猛烈的炮火夷为平地。

sentences.en: The heavy traffic was re-routed past my front door.
sentences.cn: 大量的车流改道经过我家前门。

sentences.en: The males are seven times heavier than the females.
sentences.cn: 雄性的重量是雌性的七倍。

sentences.en: The outside air was heavy and moist and sultry.
sentences.cn: 外面的空气沉滞、潮湿而闷热。

sentences.en: The wardrobe was too heavy for me to move on my own.
sentences.cn: 衣橱太重，我一个人移不动。

sentences.en: The West is getting a heavy dose of snow and rain today.
sentences.cn: 西部今天将迎来一场大的雨夹雪。

sentences.en: There was a heavy thudding noise against the bedroom door.
sentences.cn: 卧室门上发出一声沉重的撞击声。

sentences.en: We could now very plainly hear their heavy tread.
sentences.cn: 我们现在可以非常清楚地听到他们沉重的脚步声。

words.tran_cn: 沉重；沉闷；笨拙；迟钝；忧伤

phrases.tran_cn: 重油（将焦油蒸馏得到的比重大于水）
(英，非正式)暴力犯罪团伙；一群强壮的保镖

trans.tran_cn: 重的，超出一般的，大量的，结实的，厚的，难消化的，充满…的，粗壮的，重型的，繁忙的，猛烈的，耗费…多的，严肃的，危险的，阴沉的，泥泞的，沉痛的
明显地悬浮于，度日如年，沉溺于
